issue.title: Several typos/errors in Layout.md examples
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-211](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-211). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The problems are:
- in "List<List<byte>>" offsets should be 0256 (not 0267), right?
- in "Struct<List<char>, Int32>" field_0 null_bitmap should be 00001101 (not 00011101);
- in "Dense union" "Field-1 array (f: float)" should be "Field-1 array (i: int32)";
- and in "SparseUnion" "mark" should be replaced with "{u2='mark'}".

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-211?focusedCommentId=15317958) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 86
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/86>
